description:
commit 2f317ba7 introduced several ghost flags
and removed some useful flags.

https://github.com/openstack/nova/commit/2f317ba79f262a8cd325844a1a258efab22e5fa1#nova/log.py

https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/904305

So remove the ghost flags and bring back the useful flags.
title: Remove ghost flags in log.py

comments.content:
commit 2f317ba7 introduced several ghost flags
and removed some useful flags.

So remove the ghost flags and bring back the useful flags.
